details.description: Contact DVLA to find out if your medical condition or medical treatment will affect your driving
details.alternative_title: Contact information for DVLA - Drivers Medical Enquiries
details.body:
Find out if your health condition will affect your driving and if you’ll be able to keep your licence.

DVLA – Drivers Medical Enquiries
Email DVLA
Telephone: 0300 790 6806 (car drivers and motorcyclists)
Telephone: 0300 790 6807 (bus, coach and lorry drivers)
Monday to Friday, 8am to to 5:30pm
Saturday, 8am to 1pm

Drivers Medical Group
DVLA
Swansea
SA99 1TU

You can find out:

  • what health conditions or medical treatments you need to tell the DVLA about
  • how to reapply for your licence if you have it taken away

For confidentiality reasons, DVLA won’t send driver numbers or personal details by email.
